tool_description: Adjusts motor control parameters to achieve desired conveyor belt performance while ensuring safe operation.

motor_id.description: Unique identifier of the motor to adjust

target_speed.description: Target belt speed in meters per minute (1-1000)

error_messages: Motor not accessible: Cannot establish communication with motor controller. Check connection and power status.
Invalid target speed: target_speed must be within operational limits (1-1000 m/min) for this motor.
Adjustment out of range: voltage_adjustment (-100 to 100V) or frequency_adjustment (-50 to 50Hz) exceeds safe limits.
Invalid torque limit: torque_limit must be positive and within motor specifications.
Invalid ramp time: ramp_time must be between 1 and 300 seconds for safe acceleration.
Motor safety interlock: Cannot proceed due to active safety interlock or emergency stop condition.
usage: Specify motor_id, target_speed, and desired adjustments. The tool applies changes gradually using the specified ramp time for safety.

adjustment_successful.description: Whether the parameter adjustment was completed successfully

final_voltage.description: Final voltage setting after adjustment in volts

final_frequency.description: Final frequency setting after adjustment in Hz

achieved_speed.description: Actual belt speed achieved in meters per minute

adjustment_time.description: Total time taken for adjustment in seconds

status_message.description: Detailed status message about the adjustment process
